function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High-resolution population density data used to define areas, potentially leading to high population density contact points","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Use additional data sources for contact points outside of high population density areas","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis to identify high-risk contact points","People":"Resident population in high population density areas","Owner":"Health and government authorities"},{"Description":"Assumption of per-capita contacts within schools being double those elsewhere, potentially leading to higher transmission rates in schools","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among school-aged children","Mitigation":"Implement mitigation measures such as social distancing and mask mandates in schools","Technologies":"Simulation models to test the impact of mitigation measures","People":"School-aged children, teachers, school staff","Owner":"Education authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Assumption of 5.1-day incubation period, potentially affecting the timing of disease control measures","Impact":"Delayed identification and control of infected individuals","Mitigation":"Implement testing and quarantine protocols based on updated incubation period research","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing technologies for early identification of infected individuals","People":"General population at risk of infection","Owner":"Health authorities, testing facilities"}]}
